title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Kemil Beach Access Point
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps     Kemil Beach Access Point                Kemil Beach        NPS Collection       Getting There  Kemil Beach and Dune Ridge Trail Parking Lot North of U.S. Highway 12 on East State Park Road (300E), Beverly Shores, IN 46301. Note: East State Park Road is called Kemil Road to the south of U.S. Highway 12.   GPS Coordinates 41.677357, -87.008950 (Decimal Degrees)    Need to Know   Open daily from 7:00 a.m. to 30 minutes past sunset. Free (no access fee). Pets are permitted on a leash (6' or shorter). Glass containers are prohibited on all beaches. Seasonal restrooms and a drinking fountain at the parking lot (April 1 – November 15). Parking lot has 81 spots and will fill up quickly on summer weekends.   Visitor Activities  Swimming. No lifeguards. Swim at your own risk. Rip currents and large waves can make swimming hazardous. Hike the Dunes Ridge Trail for great views of the Great Marsh. Walk past five historic homes from the 1933 Century of Progress World's Fair, which are located 1/2 mile to the east along Lake Front Drive. Smelt fishing in the spring (permit required).   Nearby Beaches   Dunbar Beach Lake View Beach Porter Beach
